flawed_nl_solution:
1 hour is 60 minutes so 3 hours is 3*60 = <<3*60=180>>180 minutes
Three-quarters of 180 minutes is (3/4)*180 = <<(3/4)*180=240>>240 minutes
He spends 15 minutes on 1 page so he will spend 240 minutes on 240/15 = <<240/15=16>>16 pages

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 135, not 240. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
